title: Michael Zezas: Unlikely Paths to Stimulus May Interest Investors
description: As hopes for an additional stimulus package wane in the run-up to the U.S. elections, some of the less likely paths to a deal may provide a way out of the current correction. Michael Zezas, Head of U.S. Public Policy Research, explains.
